title: Handle a Backup Offer
description: A property is already under contract, but another buyer wants to submit a backup offer in case the first deal falls through.

tasks.description: Explain the concept of a backup offer to the new buyer and their agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer understands their offer will only become primary if the current contract is terminated.

tasks.description: Prepare the offer using a backup offer addendum.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally sound backup offer is drafted.

tasks.description: Present the backup offer to the seller for their signature and place it in the transaction file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The backup offer is executed by the seller and properly filed.
